messages.title: Education
messages.content: Douglas Chapman will support our schools and I know he is committed to high quality education for all our kids. #GoDouglas. Martin Cairns, teacher

messages.title: Schools
messages.content: I'll be voting for Douglas Chapman as my next MP. He did everything he could to save West Fife schools from Labour's ill-thought out school closure plans - thanks. Shirley Macdonald, 'Save Pittcorthie Primary' campaigner

messages.title: High School
messages.content: If it wasn't for Douglas, we'd probably still be waiting for a new Dunfermline High... and what a fabulous school to deliver! Daniel Anderson, senior Dunfermline High School pupil

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Douglas Chapman is committed to supporting high quality education and preventing school closures.

issues.education: Douglas Chapman will support our schools and I know he is committed to high quality education for all our kids.

contactInformation.address: Both at Dunfermline & West Fife SNP, 6B Chalmers Street, Dunfermline, KY12 8DF

endorsements.endorsement: I'll be voting for Douglas Chapman as my next MP. He did everything he could to save West Fife schools from Labour's ill-thought out school closure plans - thanks.
If it wasn't for Douglas, we'd probably still be waiting for a new Dunfermline High... and what a fabulous school to deliver!
Douglas Chapman will support our schools and I know he is committed to high quality education for all our kids.

quotes.text: What real people say about Douglas as #mynextMP

images.caption: Vote for Douglas Chapman Stronger for Scotland X
